message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase this high-quality product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $18000. What do you think?
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. I can do better than $12000, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $16000?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about $14000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob. I can do a bit better than that. How about we try $16500?
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm willing to compromise, so how about $13500?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob. I can do a bit better than that. How about we try $17000?
I'm still interested in the product, Alice. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so how about $14000?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I can do a bit better than that. How about we try $15500?
